    public class OmemoMessageBuilder<T_IdKeyPair,T_IdKey,T_PreKey,T_SigPreKey,T_Sess,T_Addr,T_ECPub,T_Bundle,T_Ciph>
extends Object
    Class used to build OMEMO messages.

                    throws NoSuchPaddingException,

                           InvalidKeyException,
                           NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                           IllegalBlockSizeException,
                           UnsupportedEncodingException,
                           NoSuchProviderException,
                           InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Create a OmemoMessageBuilder.
        Parameters:
        omemoManager - OmemoManager of our device.
        omemoStore - OmemoStore.
        aesKey - AES key that will be transported to the recipient. This is used eg. to encrypt the body.
        iv - IV
        Throws:
        NoSuchPaddingException
        BadPaddingException
        InvalidKeyException
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        IllegalBlockSizeException
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        NoSuchProviderException

        Parameters:
        omemoManager - omemoManager of our device.
        omemoStore - omemoStore.

    • Method Detail

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(String message)
                throws NoSuchPaddingException,
                       NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                       NoSuchProviderException,
                       InvalidAlgorithmParameterException,
                       InvalidKeyException,
                       UnsupportedEncodingException,
                       BadPaddingException,
                       IllegalBlockSizeException
        Create an AES messageKey and use it to encrypt the message. Optionally append the Auth Tag of the encrypted message to the messageKey afterwards.
        Parameters:
        message - content of the message
        Throws:
        NoSuchPaddingException - When no Cipher could be instantiated.
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - when no Cipher could be instantiated.
        NoSuchProviderException - when BouncyCastle could not be found.
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - when the Cipher could not be initialized
        InvalidKeyException - when the generated key is invalid
        UnsupportedEncodingException - when UTF8 is unavailable
        BadPaddingException - when cipher.doFinal gets wrong padding
        IllegalBlockSizeException - when cipher.doFinal gets wrong Block size.

      • addRecipient

        public void addRecipient(OmemoDevice device)
                  throws CryptoFailedException,
                         UndecidedOmemoIdentityException,
                         CorruptedOmemoKeyException
        Add a new recipient device to the message.
        Parameters:
        device - recipient device
        Throws:
        CryptoFailedException - when encrypting the messageKey fails
        UndecidedOmemoIdentityException
        CorruptedOmemoKeyException

      • addRecipient

        public void addRecipient(OmemoDevice device,
                         boolean ignoreTrust)
                  throws CryptoFailedException,
                         UndecidedOmemoIdentityException,
                         CorruptedOmemoKeyException
        Add a new recipient device to the message.
        Parameters:
        device - recipient device
        ignoreTrust - ignore current trust state? Useful for keyTransportMessages that are sent to repair a session
        Throws:
        CryptoFailedException
        UndecidedOmemoIdentityException
        CorruptedOmemoKeyException
